title: The Ipcress file
creator_credit: Rank Film Distributors, Harry Saltzman, Sidney J. Furie and Ken Adam
brief_description: Based on Len Deighton’s bestseller and produced by Bond films’ Harry Saltzman, this video will be a welcome addition to fans of the world of spies and espionage. Michael Caine stars as British espionage agent Harry Palmer, a cynical and rebellious ex-Army sergeant who has been blackmailed into working for Britain’s secret service. He finds himself caught up in The Ipcress File, a horrifying conspiracy that involves brainwashing, murder, treachery, and implicates involvement at the highest level; M5. Cast includes Michael Caine, Nigel Green, Guy Doleman, Sue Lloyd, Gordon Jackson and Aubrey Richards.
